english_sentence: According to Bhavprakash Nighantu, alpinia galanga is used to pacify kapha dosha in the body.
hindi_sentence: भवप्रकाश निघंतू के अनुसार, अल्पाइनिया गैलंगा का उपयोग शरीर में कफ दोष को शांत करने के लिए किया जाता है।

english_sentence: It is heavy in nature, bitter in taste and hot in potency.

english_sentence: It helps to cure inflammation, pain, gout, cough and poisoning.

english_sentence: This herb is used to treat 80 types of vata disorders.

english_sentence: It is believed to have originated in Southeast Asia, specifically in Southern China.

english_sentence: Today, it is cultivated in India, Arabia, Thailand, Indonesia and Sri Lanka.

english_sentence: It is found in specialty markets in Europe, Asia and the United States.

english_sentence: It can also grow in shrubs, forests, and open spaces.
